SELECT hostname,hostipaddr,confid,priority,licid,protocoltype, authport,syncport,ftradiusenabled,radiusenabled,radauthport,httpenabled,httpport,httpsenabled,httpsport,keystorepwd, certificatepwd,keystoreinstance,keystorerootpath,soapenabled,soapport,webservicename,descp FROM
(select top $pageSize$ * from otppms_hostinfo where 1=1
and hostipaddr not in (select top $startRow$ hostipaddr from otppms_hostinfo where 1=1
order by hostipaddr asc ) order by hostipaddr asc ) otppms_hostinfo order by hostipaddr asc
